question: Which missile will carry an orbiter, a lander and a rover to the moon?
explanation: Setting its own records and achieving milestones, India's space research organization ISRO is set to launch Chandrayaan-2 mission around April this year. The Union Minister for Atomic Energy and Space, Dr Jitendra Singh said that Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) is planning to launch Chandrayan-2 Mission around April this year. Chandrayaan-2 is the country's second mission to the moon.
